description: Create a new background job (generic). Accepts CreateJobInput with jobType (required, String, validated job types: insert_csv_file, export_csv_file, etc.), jobData (required, JSON object), retryCount (optional, Int, default 3, max 10). Returns Job with uuid (placeholder - Connectra returns async), jobType, status (pending), data, createdAt. Uses ConnectraClient.create_job to create job in Connectra. Raises ValidationError (422) if jobType or retryCount invalid.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateJob($input: CreateJobInput!) { jobs { createJob(input: $input) { uuid jobType status data createdAt } } }
